title: files corrupting after being moved to a folder
body:
expected behaviour

files should be accessible no matter in what folder you move them to



actual behavior 

files dont necessarily corrupt after being moved but it is impossible to view them under the new folder.when i move a pdf file to a folder when i try to open it it say that it is corrupted but when i move it back to the root folder it works fine same thing with all other types of documents


steps to reproduce
1.go to mikelange.no-ip.org/owncloud
the demo login is demo and the password is also demo
2.move any file in the root folder (files) to a created folder then try to open it

server configuration

operating system: windows 7

web server: apache

database: mysql

php version:5.3x

owncloud version: 5.0.9

client configuration

browser: chrome 

operating system:

logs

web server error log

insert your webserver log here
owncloud log (data/owncloud.log)

decryption (asymmetric) of sealed content with share-key "" failed

browser log
